resources.string: This AR measurement application is designed for ESTIMATION purposes only and is NOT 100% accurate. Measurements taken with this app may contain significant errors due to:

• Device camera quality and calibration
• Lighting conditions
• Surface textures and materials
• User measurement technique
• ARCore system limitations
• Device hardware capabilities

• Use this app ONLY for preliminary material estimation
• Always verify measurements with professional tools
• Consult licensed professionals for construction projects
• Double-check all calculations before purchasing materials
• Consider additional waste material (typically 10-15%)

• Professional measuring tapes
• Laser measuring devices
• Calibrated surveying equipment
• Licensed contractors or architects
I understand that this app provides estimates only and I will use proper measurement tools for accurate results
